n_tickets.description: Number of tickets you want to scrape.

t_start.description: The start timestamp used to query Zendesk tickets.

t_end.description: The end timestamp used to query Zendesk tickets.

zendesk_email.description: Email used to authenticate with Zendesk.

zendesk_password.description: Password used to authenticate with Zendesk.

zendesk_subdomain.description: Subdomain used to authenticate with Zendesk.
